Text: I am the author of this and this was my initial exploration into uploading a torrent. After some experimentation I have developed this into one called The Seven gifts - A rite of passage, which includes a cover picture and a note from me. I have tried to delete this one but to no avail. If you want this book you should please take The Seven Gifts - A rite of passage.
The other torrent also includes a mobi and two diferent pdfs. I cannot find a way to edit my first comment.
